name: Abramelin Soap
description: ‘Take thou also unto thee the principal spices, of flowing myrrh, and of sweet cinnamon, of sweet galangal, and of cassia, and of olive oil, and thou shalt make it a holy anointing oil’ EXODUS 30:23-25 This soap is based on Abramelin Oil, a Jewish holy anointing oil described in the old testament of the bible. The combination of ground myrrh tears, cinnamon powder, galangal powder (similar to ginger), and cassia essential oil smells amazingly like cookie dough. Who knew holy oil could smell like cookies?! The ground spices add an invigorating exfoliating characteristic to the bar. This is scrumptious soap that will warm your soul and senses while you take a shower. 100% vegan friendly As with all Smells and Bells soaps, there are no synthetic ingredients used (only essential oils—no fragrance oils). Organic oils are used wherever possible. Each bar of soap comes wrapped in gold tissue paper and is tied with a white crushed velvet ribbon and a small brass bell.

name: TestaMint Soap
description:
TestaMint Soap has moisturizing shea butter, gently exfoliating peppermint leaves, and a sweet vanilla mint scent. 100% vegan friendly

	All of Smells and Bells soaps are handmade in the cold processed method with pure and natural vegan ingredients. Each soap comes wrapped in beautifully crafted paper and adorned with an artisan ribbon and a small brass bell.

name: Rosary Soap
description:
Hail Mary, full of Grace! This handmade soap is full of graceful, glorious roses. Mixed with rose petals, rose kaolin clay and deeply scented with rose geranium, rosewood and frankincense, it’s a truly natural blessing to use in the bath.

	Each soap comes wrapped in pink and silver tissue paper and is tied with beautiful ribbon and a small brass bell.

	As with all Smells and Bells soaps, only natural ingredients are used. No fragrance oils or other synthetics! Organic oils and essences are used wherever possible. 100% vegan friendly

name: EnlightenMint Lip Balm
description:
With menthol crystals, peppermint essential oil, and a hint of ylang ylang flower essence, enlightenMint lip balm provides a soothingly scented tingle. Organic cocoa butter, food grade organic coconut cream, natural beeswax, and organic rosehip oil make this balm extremely moisturizing and great for your skin.

	Each lip balm has a tiny brass bell wrapped onto the tube with shiny gold thread.
